countrynote
  • Examples
    • EXGRDVA_EX
  • Reference

exgrdvaex

exgrdvaex indicator

exgrdvaex(data, cou, yr, refyr)

Arguments

data
the input data to use.
cou
character ISO3 country code.
yr
integer latest year.
refyr
integer reference year.

Details

Use exgrdvaex indicator.

Examples

data(icioIndic_data, package = "countrynote")
exgrdvaex(icioIndic_data, "USA", 2009, 1995)
#> $data_plot
#> $data_plot$data_year
